product.title: Harper Fog
product.description: Min width: 300mm max width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 62% polyester 38% cotton guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. relproducts.title: Harper Burnt Orange - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: This beautiful array of shades is the perfect tonic if you're shopping for some vibrant and zesty roman blinds that will bring your interior to life. A welcome sense of calm is introduced by the shades of grey and light blue that really help set the tone. The living room will transform itself into the heart of the home when you pair this offering from the harper range with some light blue walls and a selection of orange and yellow accessories.

relproducts.title: Santiago Cotton Natural Cream Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Their santiago cotton roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. This nautral cream cottonroman blind, introduces a dark cream/light brown shade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.
